articles.author: Matthew Sussex
articles.title: A grand bargain with Putin or confrontation with China: 3 ways Trump may change America’s place in the world - The Conversation
articles.description: The global implications of a confident and unfettered Trump 2.0 will depend very much on what foreign policy path he charts and whom he decides to appoint to key positions.
articles.content:
With a resounding victory in the US presidential election, Donald Trump can now claim a sweeping mandate to implement his agenda, both foreign and domestic.
